member.name: M:Unigine.Package.getNumFiles
member.summary: Return the number of files in the package.

member.name: M:Unigine.Package.clone
member.summary: Clone the external package for multi-threaded loading.
member.returns: The cloned package. Return NULL if the multi-threading loading is not possible.

member.name: M:Unigine.Package.readFile(unsignedchar,int)
member.returns: Returns 1 if the file is successfully read; otherwise, 0 is returned.

member.name: M:Unigine.Package.selectFile(char,int)
member.returns: Returns 1 if the file is selected; otherwise, 0 is returned.
